title: Automated YouTube Channel
description: Developed an automated content generation system using a Raspberry Pi server and custom Python physics engine, resulting in 70K+ subscribers and 45 million+ views.

title: Smart Wildlife Monitoring Camera
description: Led a team to develop a solar-powered wildlife camera system using Raspberry Pi, YOLOv5, and delay tolerant Bluetooth data transfer for remote wildlife observation.

title: Cybersecurity in E-Commerce
description: Designed and developed a secure e-commerce platform demo, implementing advanced encryption techniques and benchmarking various security methods.

title: Pet the Pup
description: Created a virtual dog petting web app using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Three.js for an interactive and fun user experience.
